supply.supply_status: Good - Autotrasportabile division stationed at Bardia near Egyptian border at Italy's entry into WWII (10 June 1940). Fuel reserves 15 days for partial motorization, ammunition 20 days for defensive operations, water 3L/man/day for desert garrison, food 18 days. Mixed motor/animal transport (1,735 mules & horses). Supply base: Bardia, supplemented by Tobruk.
